member.name: M:ordermanagement.shared.product_authority_api.SwaggerEnumNamesFilter.Apply(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Swagger.Schema,Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerGen.SchemaFilterContext)
